page.title: 06THE VICAR OF SOUTHILL
page.content: The vicar of Southill has an extra job as well as just being the vicar.In the afternoons he trains young people to be vicars.For the rest of the day he conducts services and visits people in the parish.A typical service would consist of prayers,hymns and readings from the Bible.The vicar has to wear a special tunic and a white 'dog' collar for the services.The present vicar of the All Saints Church in Southill began work there in Nineteen Seventy Nine.The church was first built in the 13th century but parts of it have been restored several times since then and only a small part of the original church remains.The present vicar hasn't performed any exorcisms to rid houses of 'evil spirits' but he has prayed with people whose houses have had strange things happening in them.
